title: CardBody
description: The card body is the central part of the card that is used to display additional information alongside the content shown in the card header.

HeaderSeparator.description: Separator between card header and body.

FooterSeparator.description: Separator between card body and footer.

Styles.description: Style to be applied on the card body separators.

HeaderSeparator.description: The string value is a style class name for `HeaderSeparator`.

BodySeparator.description: The string value is a style class name for `BodySeparator`.

FooterSeparator.description: The string value is a style class name for `FooterSeparator`.

Content.description: Dynamic binding of Content. The content can be text, label bar, space, and separator. `Content` must be paired with `BindingCollection`.

BindingCollection.description: Definition of the BindingCollection to dynamically populate the collection. You can set this to binding/rule to return an array of data items. Note: If this is set to binding/rule, you must return an array of data items.

Contents.description: Static binding of Content. The content can be text, label bar, space, and separator. `Contents` is ignored if `Content` and `BindingCollection` are defined.

anyOf.description: Expects return of `BodyContent` in array format.
